  "description": "Amo Farm Sieberer Hatchery Limited has a Vision to be the market leader in the Day Old Chicks market; through exceptional quality products and services that will guarantee profitable poultry farming.

The Company produces high-quality Day-Old Chicks and Point of Cage Pullets. Over the years, we have remained focused on our main objective to produce high quality chicks, in a highly hygienic environment leveraging innovative solutions grounded in Research and Development.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Control Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Awe, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Purpose


	To ensure that all hatchery operations, including egg handling, incubation, and chick processing, meet internal and regulatory quality standards.
	The role supports healthy chick production, biosecurity, and compliance with food safety regulations.


Key Responsibilities


	Inspect and verify incoming hatching eggs for weight, cleanliness, and shell quality.
	Monitor hatchery environments (temperature, humidity, airflow) and ensure equipment calibration.
	Supervise sanitation and disinfection procedures in incubation and hatching areas.
	Enforce biosecurity protocols across all hatchery operations.
	Support audits by regulatory bodies and ensure compliance with animal health standards.
	Conduct random sampling of chicks for quality grading, deformities, and weight.
	Document hatchability rates, mortality, and quality deviations; recommend corrective actions.
	Collaborate with veterinary, production, and logistics teams to maintain chick viability.
	Train staff on hygiene and product handling procedures.
	Report any non-conforming procedures or deviations immediately to supervisors.


Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND in Animal Science, Microbiology, or related field.
	Minimum 3 years of experience in a poultry hatchery or animal production environment.
	Knowledge of HACCP, GMP, and hatchery hygiene standards.
	Strong attention to detail and documentation accuracy.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;vacancies@afshltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

	We are seeking a motivated and result-oriented Sales and Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team in Amichi.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving sales growth, expanding market presence, and building strong relationships with customers and partners in the region.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and develop new business opportunities in Amichi and surrounding areas.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and distributors.
	Execute sales strategies to achieve set targets.
	Monitor market trends and competitor activities to inform marketing strategies.
	Conduct product presentations, promotions, and roadshows.
	Provide regular sales reports and feedback to management.
	Work with internal teams to ensure excellent customer service delivery.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in sales or marketing (preferably in FMCG or similar industry).
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Familiarity with Amichi market terrain is an added advantage.
	Must be self-motivated and able to work with minimal supervision.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: recruitment@eriscofoodsltd.com.ng using “Sales and Marketing Executive - Amichi” as the subject of the mail.

We are currently hiring an experienced and objective-driven candidates to fill the below positions:

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior IT Officer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities

	IT Infrastructure Management: Oversee the maintenance and operation of computer systems, networks, and software and ensure the reliability and security of IT infrastructure.
	Security Management: Implement and monitor security measures to protect data and systems from cyber threats and conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
	Technical Support: Provide advanced technical support to resolve complex IT issues and mentor and guide junior IT staff in troubleshooting and problem-solving.
	Project Management: Lead IT projects, including system upgrades, migrations, and new installations and collaborate with other departments to understand and meet their IT needs.
	Policy Development: Develop and enforce IT policies and procedures to ensure compliance and security and stay updated with the latest technology trends and recommend improvements.
	Vendor Management: Manage relationships with external vendors and service providers and evaluate and negotiate contracts for IT services and products.
	Training and Development: Conduct training sessions for staff on new technologies and best practices and promote continuous learning and professional development within the IT team.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field is preferred
	Minimum of 6 – 9 years of cognate experiences from manufacturing companies.
	Proven track record in IT support, administration, and management.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to optimize processes and drive cost savings.
	Certification in IT (e.g., CCNA etc.) will be an added advantage.
	Excellent leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.

	Strong technical knowledge of computer hardware, software, and networks.
	Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.
	Familiarity with operating systems like Windows, Linux, and macOS.
	Knowledge of network protocols, security principles, and best practices.
	Strong project management skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to lead and mentor a team.


Method of Application
